name: Dungeon Krawler
description:
CAUTION!

This is not my game! It´s from https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=f6RiWi32oO0&list=PL9FzW-m48fn1JgK_mavg7ym6nvchF9Yjb (HeartBeast).

The game is also open source (look into the discription of the video).

All i did was to change the color of the assets. I want to learn how to programm. Thats why i am uploading his game. 

Please give me some ideas how i can change this game a bit up. 

If you have any ideas feel free to post these in the comments ;)
